Hi @Hagop <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> ,

 

Tried reaching you many times for call , but was not able to.

This is regarding the insurance I have received from your side via Teams.

 

This is just to reconfirm what I have mentioned via teams, this insurance what I have initially requested due to the cargo high value.

Since the shipment will not be loaded from the shipper / supplier side due to lack of facility, this will be collected from shipper WH and will be loaded in Third part WH.

 

Kindly reconfirm from your end will this be covered in the marine insurance policy attached.

 

 

Regards 

SAGAR SREENIVAS​​​​
